channel.title: SQL on The DS Dev
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on The DS Dev

item.title: What Is SQL Anyway?
item.description: Structured Query Language, or SQL, is a language used for the manipulation and querying of databases. Let’s have an example: 1 2 3 SELECT * FROM Lemurs WHERE Name = "Blue-eyed Black Lemur" SQL is not like HTML. You can’t open an SQL file in a browser and see a pretty-printed table as a result. It just doesn’t work that way. Here is some reasoning: How is the browser going to know which database to query?
